EmailTemplate.name: Newline Interactive
EmailTemplate.subject: Newline Interactive
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName},
Here's a great way to impact your organization's presentations and turn them into a productivity tool you can easily share with others.
TRUTOUCH LED Displays and Idea Max Interactive White Board's both combine the easiest-to-use software, with the most advanced hardware, to give you powerful presentations that last FOREVER.
* Record meetings and presentations
* Save and export documents in PDF, ppt, html and jpeg
* Easily incorporate multi-media content into your presentations
* Make notes on documents viewed on IdeaMax
* Embed notes from your meeting into PowerPoint
* Handwriting recognition turns less than perfect writing into perfect text
For more details on how to start increasing your productivity immediately at truly affordable rates, call me.
